related_questions.question:
What do the snakes do...?
a.slither
b.move
c.walk
d.slide​

answers.answer:
A. SLITHER

Penjelasan

Slither: merayap atau melata(karena ular tidak mempunyai kaki)

Move: pindah

Walk: Berjalan ( gak ada kakinya)

Slide: meluncur (kurang tepat)

JADIKAN JAWABAN TERBAIK JIKA ANDA MERASA TERBANTU✨

related_questions.question: Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a....daydesi:yes. lets play outdoor

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a sunny day

Desi: yes. lets play outdoor!

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan merupakan kata sifat (Adjective) yaitu sunny yang berarti cerah dan berfungsi untuk menjelaskan kata benda (Noun) day. Karena hari cerah, maka Desi mengajak untuk bermain di luar.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
Mrs Ratih is teaching the student now. she is

TOLONG DI JAWAB YA, BUKAN DI TRANSLATE TIN YA​
Tigor and his family... the museum a.campong b. hiking c.visited d.swiming​

11.Nanda and her brother ... at five o'clock every morning.    a. woke up
b. wake up
c. waking up
12. The students ... study online in 2019.
a. Do not
b. did not
c. were not
13. Junercho ... the film until 10 pm every night
a. Watches
b. watch
C. watched
14. Dewa wanted to be a teacher when he ... a child.
b. do
c. am
15. Does your father ... to work early in the morning?
a. go
b. went
C. gone
16.Tiger and lion ... the heaviest land animal.
a. is not
b. are not
C. do not
a. was​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

11. B. Wake up.

12. A. Do not.

13. A. Watches.

14. Was.

15. A. Go.

16. B. Are not.

Penjelasan:

Nomor 11-16 menggunakan kalimat Simple Present Tense, kecuali nomor 14 menggunakan kalimat Simple Past Tense.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question:
19. Indri    Sinta : Today is September 9.
Indri : I see, thanks
a. What day is it today? c. Is today the September 9?
b. What date is it today? d. When will we leave?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B. What date is it today?

Penjelasan: Date biasa digunakan jika jawaban memiliki angka seperti: Desember 4

Day biasa digunakan jika jawaban hanya memiliki hari tidak ada angka seperti: Friday

Jawaban:

a. What day is it today?
